title: Tips from ex-smokers6
subtitle: Office on Smoking and Health, National Center for Chronic Disease Prevention and Health Promotion, Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
description: Its obvious that successful smoking cessation depends on many variables  some methods wont work for some people while others will and some smokers will get the best results from a combination of techniques. Read out Smoking Cessation stories and learn from their mistakes.
